item.title: DRUE
item.description: DRUE This is a showcase of a bit of software I've been writing. I am a newbie drummer and wanted to spice up some practice with a light show so this links the lights in my room (Philips HUE bulbs) with my drumkit. Demo: A few things to note I only show you 2 ‘modes’ that I've implemented: Change color - Reactive to your hits-per-minute (HPM): orange when idle, 200+ HPM and you get blue 600+ HPM and you get red NOTE: these are sampled every 0.
